backend/main.mo: Actor exposing a simple healthCheck query returning a status string.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping features to related frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of numerous frontend source files across the project.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base/theme variables defining color tokens and light/dark mode CSS custom properties.
frontend/index.html: HTML bootstrap file mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app handling initialization, PIN lock, auto‑lock, theming, and loading the main shell.
frontend/src/components/camera/CameraAli: Renders optional rule‑of‑thirds grid and crosshair overlay for camera alignment.
frontend/src/components/camera/CameraCap: Full camera capture UI with permission handling, alignment guides, ghost overlay, view templates, and capture controls.
frontend/src/components/camera/CameraFli: Button component to switch between front and back cameras with loading state.
frontend/src/components/camera/GhostOver: Dialog that displays session photos and lets the user select or clear a reference photo for ghost overlay alignment.
frontend/src/components/layout/ClinicalS: Main application shell managing layout, patient/session panels, settings, camera, voice memo, and comparison overlays.
frontend/src/components/patients/Patient: Confirmation dialog for deleting a patient and all associated local data.
Dialog for creating or editing a patient record with fields for name, ID, DOB, and treatment history.
Patient list with search, selection, visit counts, and a dialog for creating new patients.
frontend/src/components/photos/PhotoAnno: Canvas component that draws and records annotations on photos, including freehand, highlights, text, and stamp tools.
Toolbar providing pen, highlight, text, and stamp tools with color/size controls and undo/clear for photo annotations.
frontend/src/components/photos/PhotoThum: Displays session photo thumbnails with view template badges, selection handling, and delete actions.
frontend/src/components/photos/PhotoView: Full-screen viewer supporting zoom/pan and annotation mode with tools and template display.
frontend/src/components/photos/SessionPh: Imports image files into a session with view template assignment and feedback handling.
frontend/src/components/security/PinLock: PIN entry screen with keypad, validation, and unlock callback.
frontend/src/components/sessions/Session: Confirmation dialog for deleting a session and its associated data.
Modal dialog for creating or editing a session, including title, date, and multi‑select treatment types with save handling and validation.
frontend/src/components/settings/AboutLo: Displays app info and a notice explaining that all data is stored locally in the browser with no external transmission.
frontend/src/components/settings/Brandin: Provides UI to edit clinic branding, toggle default/custom logos, preview changes, and save settings.
frontend/src/components/settings/Privacy: Allows configuring PIN lock, changing PIN, and setting auto‑lock timeout with validation and save logic.
frontend/src/components/settings/Setting: Side sheet containing tabbed settings for branding, privacy, treatment types, and app info.
frontend/src/components/settings/Treatme: Manager UI for creating, editing, and deleting treatment types with color selection and dialogs.
frontend/src/components/viewer/BeforeAft: Dialog for selecting before/after photos from a session and viewing them via comparison slider or fullscreen mode.
Full‑screen overlay showing a before/after image slider with header and usage instructions.
Interactive slider component that reveals before/after images using pointer‑based dragging and clipping.
frontend/src/components/viewer/SessionTi: Panel displaying a patient's sessions with tools for editing, deleting, importing photos, and launching camera or comparison views.
frontend/src/components/voice/VoiceMemoP: Bottom‑sheet panel for recording, saving, playing, and deleting voice memos linked to a session.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that creates and manages a backend actor based on Internet Identity and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and hooks for managing Internet Identity authentication, login flow, and stored identities.
frontend/src/hooks/usePanZoom.ts: Hook providing touch‑friendly pan and zoom behavior with wheel zoom, dragging, and pinch gestures.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers, clinical color variables, dark mode overrides, touch-target utilities, and custom scrollbars.
frontend/src/lib/export/sessionPdfExport: Empty file placeholder for session PDF export logic.
frontend/src/lib/media/audioMemo.ts: Implements audio recording utilities using MediaRecorder and provides conversion of audio data to object URLs.
frontend/src/lib/media/photoStorage.ts: Handles image validation, processing into full-resolution and thumbnail blobs, and provides utilities for image loading and object URL creation.
frontend/src/lib/models.ts: Defines core domain models for patients, sessions, media, annotations, settings, and helpers for treatment type normalization.
frontend/src/lib/search/filtering.ts: Provides utilities to filter patients and sessions by query, treatment types, and date ranges.
frontend/src/lib/security/pinLock.ts: Implements PIN hashing/verification and an auto‑lock manager based on user inactivity.
frontend/src/lib/state/useAppStore.ts: Zustand-based global store managing all clinical data, UI selections, and CRUD operations synced with IndexedDB.
frontend/src/lib/storage/indexedDb.ts: IndexedDB abstraction that initializes object stores and provides generic CRUD helpers for all clinical data types.
frontend/src/lib/storage/migrations.ts: Initializes IndexedDB on first run, seeds default treatment types and settings, and performs a migration converting sessions to a multi-treatment ID format.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, animations, container settings, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Describes project metadata, features, known issues, and architectural notes for the clinical photography app prototype.
